title: A prediction for the future of Iran
description: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita uses mathematical analysis to predict (very often correctly) such messy human events as war, political power shifts, Intifada ... After a crisp explanation of how he does it, he offers three predictions on the future of Iran.
author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita
keywords: TED, talks, global issues, math, prediction, technology, war
